amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase the funding for Title II and Title V of Juvenile Justice Programs by $2 million and offsets with decreases to the general administration fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Scanlon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scanlon amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
